channel.title: How to portforward with a laptop
channel.description: Me and my friends want to make a rsps. the problem is that we dont know how to portforward with a laptop. Any suggestions?

item.title: How to portforward with a laptop
item.dc:creator: @Marcuum Marcuum
item.description:
@Marcuum wrote:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:7, topic:347703”][quote author=Marcuum link=topic=444088.msg3260737#msg3260737 date=1278467596]

http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
Best of luck.

Death, you wana help the other kid with a portforward problem? I don’t know what to say other than use portforward.com but he still doesn’t get it -.-

Hey, I’m not a kid! I think you are since you don’t know how to help…

90% sure I did help, you just can’t follow directions at all. And you probably didn’t bother to try the search button either, but w/e.

No, ME you didn’t helped… I have did all you said before you post on my topic. I already made a RSPS, but I closed, and tried to re-open now, doesn’t as you maybe know, since you may have problems… I admit, I didn’t used the search option, and I will use, but you tell me to use, why don’t you use it to try to help me? Because you didn’t help anything yet… If you can’t help, then do not post.
[/quote]
I did try to help you, but I’ve never had any problems from portforwarding, so the best I could do was point you to the website and see what happens. I did post trying to help, so stfu.[/quote]
You TRIED, but you it didn’t helped. If you never had any problems, then don’t just post a site saying to just do what they say. If you don’t know what to say, don’t post because you will be only spamming. Are you angry or stressed? Why say ‘stfu’, boy? Grow up then talk to me… I need help, if you can’t help, just don’t post.

Read full topic
item.source: How to portforward with a laptop

I already made a RSPS, but I closed, and tried to re-open now, doesn’t as you maybe know, since you may have problems… I admit, I didn’t used the search option, and I will use, but you tell me to use, why don’t you use it to try to help me? Because you didn’t help anything yet… If you can’t help, then do not post.[/quote]
I did try to help you, but I’ve never had any problems from portforwarding, so the best I could do was point you to the website and see what happens. I did post trying to help, so stfu.
